title: Assessing HIV & Other STI Risk in American Indian/Alaska Native Communities: Participants' Manual
cleaned_text: Alternate Title Tribal Bear Project Presents health care providers with culturally relevant training tools to improve communication with patients regarding the prevention, care, and treatment of HIV and other STIs, and supports efforts to minimize STI impact, including HIV, on Native communities. Author/Creator Fransing Daisy Lee F. Brown Contributor/Editor Christopher Behrens Open Access Yes Primary Source No Publisher Northwest AIDS Education & Training Center (NW AETC) Publication Date 2005-06 Subjects Resource Type Documents & Presentations Format Text -- PDF
